replies.body: Am I the only one that sees Dyrus picking this up due to how much of a troll Heimer is?
Dyrus likes champions with simple mechanics so I don't think he will be picking up the donger any time soon. Ryze on the other hand looks more to his taste.

Wait... doesn't dyrus pick rumble sometimes? I thing that's kind of NOT simple...
{{champion:68}}
I made that comment last season.
Do you know how contradictory that statement is? Ryze is one of the most mechanically complex champs in league.

I'm sorry, but that's simply not true. Ryze is not nearly as complicated as most of the other mages. His abilities are all targeted, and all he really needs to do is farm and wait for late game when he can unload megatons of AP damage on opposing carries.

You mean you see a member of TSM, the team that defines "we only play the OP champs", picking a completely out-of-nowhere champ? Sure he still troll-farms between turrets, but he does it on Shyv and Renekton, not Singed or even Vlad any longer. Who else has he played this Spring besides Renek, Shyv, Mundo, and Trundle? (:edit: Lee Sin v. EG this past week)
Mr. Cocke has an uncanny appreciation of the {{champion:74}} er.   ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:74}} rocks. I hope we see more of him when the summer split comes up this season.
